items.text: good length and swinging in sharply. Jabs it on the up into the leg side
items.shortText: Chatara to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle stump, gets on top of the bounce and checks the punch to midwicket
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length and lifting up at off stump. Defended on the front foot off the high part of the bat
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, defended into the covers off the back foot
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length and just outside off. Doesn't come on as he hopes. The cut is off the toe-end and straight to point
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: cut uppishly but in the gap again. It's a loose shot, to be fair. Short ball in the corridor. Not too much room and he isn't on top of the bounce. In the air as he cuts and it lobs between point and cover
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full inswinger on leg stump, driven to mid-on
items.shortText: Chatara to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: inswinger on a length at off stump, dead-batted into the pitch with a gap between bat and pad
items.shortText: Chatara to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full inswinger at leg stump again, punched to mid-on uppishly
items.shortText: Chatara to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: Zimbabwe think they have Shakib caught behind down leg side. They've reviewed. It's going down leg side and he looks to flick it. Slight sound as he does so and it goes through to Taylor...but it doesn't matter. He has overstepped. It works out for Zimbabwe, they would have lost that review. It was off the pad.
items.shortText: Chatara to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 no ball

items.text: full toss wide outside off. Backs away to try and flay this through cover. Toe-ends it into the off side
items.shortText: Chatara to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: good length and shaping away outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Chatara to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length and in at off stump, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Chatara to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length in the corridor, walks at the ball and stabs as he's on the move. Thick outside edge lands in front of gully
items.shortText: Jarvis to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: flies past the slip fielder! Oh they had two slips last over, this one would have gone straight to the second one. Length ball climbs on Shakib as he chases with no feet. Big edge. First slip leaps to his left but that's too quick for him
items.shortText: Jarvis to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: keeps low and just misses off stump. In the corridor on a length, skids through at knee height as he anticipates this to come up at him on the back foot
items.shortText: Jarvis to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, driven to mid-on
items.postText: Tanveer : "Not good to see, top guys are struggling!"
items.shortText: Jarvis to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short of a length just outside off, chops it to gully off the under-edge
items.postText: Aleeph Zeebran: "I think, Bangladeshi middle order not tested in this series...Can Zimbabwe do that?"
items.shortText: Jarvis to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: lovely shot. Nicely to the pitch of it outside off, drives through the line right off the middle of the bat and beats mid-off to his right
items.shortText: Jarvis to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: length and rising into the body. Pokes it through square leg on the up
items.shortText: Chatara to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length and swinging down leg side, left alone
items.shortText: Chatara to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 wide

items.text: good length and swinging in at off stump. Pushes hard in front of the body and gets it out to mid-off. Big gap between bat and pad
items.shortText: Chatara to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: good length and sliding outside off. Looks to drive on the up and under-edges into the pitch
items.shortText: Chatara to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: good length and in at leg stump, tapped into the leg side
items.shortText: Chatara to Shakib Al Hasan, no run
